description:
In the dictionary under the word "Twink" you might find a photo of Stash.
Obviously a nickname, Stash, has just turned 18, and had been eager to do porn since he was about 14 or 15.
He's an accomplished gymnast who about eight months ago wrecked his truck and broke all kinds of bones in his lower-half. He is just now getting back in to his gymnast shape.
He's a bi-guy too. He used straight porn to keep his dick hard for the photos and video, but he does have a thing for more mature dudes. Stash says he is more of a receiver when it comes to gay sex, but I don't think that means he is a bottom. He's just used to the other dude doing all the work.
Stash seems pretty interested in doing more work, so I'm gonna try to get him in the mix. Look for more of him in the coming months!
Even if you aren't a fan of twinks, you gotta give it up for him. He is about as adorable as they come, and surely he will bring back fond memories of playing around with your buds in school!
title: Stash - Solo
